description:
In the Southern Continent of Aolai, There was a tall mountain called the Flower and Fruit Mountain. At the top of the Flower and Fruit Mountain was a very large rock. After a long, long time, it absorbed the spirits of Heaven and Earth.
Finally... The stone slowly and micraculously gained life. Then, it happened on a certain day, a sudden bolt of lightning struck this rock. In the fractured rock was...
Son Goku!
Which is to say, the egg of the Super Saiya Race appeared!
name: Son Gokuu
